Section.Name: Detail
Section.OnFormat: ' toggle picture visibility PictureCtl.Visible = not PictureCtl.Visible

DataSource.RecordSource: PARAMETERS [Report Author] String "Bernardo", Comment String "Order/Discount Report for HQ", [Mail To] String, [Numeric Entry] int 666, Urgent bool true, [Mail Before] Date 12/2; select * from [Order Details]

Field.Name: Label
Field.Text: This report shows how to (1) Collect report parameters using a parameter query, (2) Use a subreport to get a summary, and (3) Create columns with repeating headers.
